Es cliente de la institución desde hace 9 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar mercadería de ropa como faldas, blusas, camisas, pantalones, camisetas, camisolas, talladores, trajes de niñas, trajes de niños, faldas jeans, etc. Meylin mujer de 31 años su negocio es la venta de variedades como ropa y zapatos y María joven de 24 años y su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
It is a group composed of three women with small businesses, one of whom is Brenda. She is 41 years old, single and has a 15 year old son. Her business is the sale of clothing and cosmetics, which she has been doing for 5 years.

Brenda has been a member of the banking institution for 9 years now. She will use the loan to buy clothing products, such as skirts, blouses, shirts, pants, T-shirts, camisoles, brassieres, dresses for girls, suits for boys, jeans, etc.

The other members of the group are Meylin, a 31 year old woman who sells varied products like clothes and shoes, and María, who is 24 years old and has a general store.

loans.use: To buy new clothing products for sale, such as skirts, blouses, shirts, pants, T-shirts, camisoles, brassieres, dresses for girls, suits for boys, jeans, etc.

loans.name: Mana Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla mujer de 40 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo de 15 años, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 4 años, su hija le ayuda a despachar. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, jabones, galletas, chiverías, gaseosas, etc. Susana mujer de 42 años de edad su negocio es la venta de químicos, frijoles crudos, frijoles cocidos, leña y Gladys mujer de 46 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de frescos y ropa.
texts.en: This group is made up of three associates, and one of them is Karla. She is 40 years old, single, and has one son who is 15 years old. She has run a grocery store from her home for 4 years and her daughter helps her manage her business. She has been a client of this financial institution for 5 years and she needs this loan to purchase basic necessities like rice, beans, oil, sugar, soaps, cookies, snacks, soda etc. Susana is 42 years old and she sells chemicals, raw beans, cooked beans, firewood, and Gladys is 46 years old and she runs a business selling refreshments and clothes.

loans.use: purchase basic necessities like rice, beans, oil, sugar, soaps, cookies, snacks and sodas.

loans.name: Las Luchadoras Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Frezia  mujer de 36 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 8 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar mercadería como pantalones, camisas, shores, faldas, vestidos, trajes de niños, y sandalias de diferentes estilos. Mayra mujer de 45 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa y Ivania mujer de 37 años y  su negocio es la venta de comida y ropa.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three entrepreneurial members. One of them is Frezia, a 36 year old woman, who is married with an eight year old son. 

For the past five years she has run a businesses selling cosmetics. She has been a member of the group for one year. 

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as pants, shirts, shorts, skirts, children's clothes and sandals in different styles. 

Mayra, 45, sells clothes and Ivania, 37 sells food and clothes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, shirts, shorts, skirts, children's clothes and sandals in different styles.

loans.name: Coro De Angeles Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Juan hombre  de 49 años de edad, acompañado, con tres hijos de 18, 16 años y 8 meses, su negocio es la compra y venta de calzado en su comunidad y por encargo desde hace 5 meses. El crédito lo solicita para comprar más inventario de zapatos de diferentes estilos de damas y varón y comprar una paca de ropa usada. Marbely mujer de 23 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y Alexandra mujer de 22 años de edad y su negocio es la compra y venta de accesorios de plata.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members. 

One of them is Juan, a 49 year old man with a domestic partner and three children aged 18,16 and 8 months. 

He sells and buys footwear in his community. And for the past five months he also takes requests by order. 

He is requesting a loan to increase his shoe inventory in different styles for men and women and to buy a bale of used clothes. 

Marbely, 23, sells cosmetics and Alexandra, 22, buys and sells silver accessories.

loans.use: to increase his shoe inventory in different styles for men and women and to buy a bale of used clothes.

loans.name: Edith Leiva

texts.es: Doña Edith de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia es madre soltera vive con sus dos hijas quienes trabajan y le ayudan en el hogar, ella  se dedica a la venta de cuadernos  y material didáctico desde hace varios años, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, es un persona muy atenta y amable con sus clientes y por esta razón tiene gran demanda en la zona, con la ganancia que obtiene y la ayuda de sus hijas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. Doña Edith solicita un crédito para  la compra de cuadernos, libros, artículos de escritorio, materiales para librería, etc. por mayor para seguir con su negocio y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijas.
texts.en: Edith is 55 years old, lives in her own home, and is a single mother.  She lives with her two daughters who work and help her at home.  She has been selling notebooks and educational material for several years.  Her business is located in her home.  She is very attentive and friendly with her customers, which is why she is very popular in the neighborhood.  She is able to cover her household expenses with her earnings and her daughters' help.  Edith is asking for a loan to buy notebooks, books, desk items, stationery, etc. wholesale to keep her business going and improve her quality of life and that of her daughters.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, books, desk items, stationery, etc.

loans.name: Flor De Pino Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Juana mujer de 59 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 23 y 30 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, ropa y comida desde hace 30 años. Tiene 6 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para comprar zapatos de diferentes estilos usados, nuevos. ropa nueva como pantalones, camisas, camisetas, blusas, faldas, shores, etc. y una paca de ropa. Prudencia mujer de 52 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tortillas y María mujer 60 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida en su comunidad.
texts.en:
This group comprises three businesswomen. One of them is 59-year old Juana who is single and has two children aged 23 and 30. She has been selling cosmetics, clothing, and food for thirty years. Juana has been a client with this institution for six years. She is seeking a loan to buy used and new shoes in different styles, as well as new clothing such as pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, skirts, and shorts, and a bundle of used clothing.

The other members of the group are Prudencia who is 52 and sells tortillas, and María who is 60 and sells food in her neighbourhood.

loans.use: Buy used and new shoes and clothing

loans.name: Las Originales  2 Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Darling mujer de 29 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 11 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon desde hace 3 años. Los productos los distribuye en su comunidad. El crédito lo requiere para comprar cosméticos como perfumes, lociones, cremas faciales, cremas corporales, brillos, accesorio para el hogar, pinturas de labios y uñas, etc. y comprar mercadería de ropa nueva como pantalones de damas, de varón, blusas, camisas, camisetas, faldas, shores, vestidos, etc. Dayluvi mujer de 22 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería y Horacio hombre de 52 años de edad y su negocio es la venta y elaboración de cuero y calzado.
texts.en:
This group is formed of three entrepreneurial members. One of them is Darling, a 29 year old woman, married with an eleven year old son. 

For the past three years she has had a business selling Avon cosmetics. She sells the products in her community. 

She is requesting a loan to buy cosmetics such as perfume, lotion, facial cream, body cream, lip gloss, home accessories, lipstick, nail polish etc. and to buy clothing merchandise such as women and men's pants, blouses, shirts, t-shirts, skirts, shorts, etc. 

Dayluvi, a 22,woman, owns a grocery store and Horacio, a 52 year old man, sells and makes leather footwear.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as perfume, lotion, facial cream, body cream, lip gloss, home accessories, lipstick, nail polish etc. and to buy clothing merchandise such as women and men's pants, blouses, shirts, t-shirts, skirts, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Divino Maestro Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es María mujer de 53 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo de 18 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos desde hace 5 años, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad y alrededores. Tiene 4 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosméticos como perfumes, lociones, labiales, cremas, faciales, cremas corporales, protectores solares, set de perfumes Barbie de niñas, lencería y cubiertos para el hogar. Juana mujer de 60 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería, venta de zapatos y ropa. Ana mujer de 26 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos.
texts.en:
This group is formed of three entrepreneurial members. One of them is Maria, a 53 year old woman, who is in a relationship and has an eighteen year old son. 

She has sold cosmetics for the past five years. She sells her products in her community and neighboring areas. She has been a group member for four years. 

She is requesting the loan to buy cosmetics such as perfume, lotion, lipstick, face cream, body cream, sun screen, a set of Barbie perfumes for girls, lingerie, and cutlery for the home. 

Juana, a 60 year old women, owns a grocery store, and sells shoes and clothing. 

Ana, a 26 year old woman sells clothing and shoes.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as perfume, lotion, lipstick, face cream, body cream, sun screen, barbie perfumes for girls, lingerie, and cutlery for the home.

loans.name: Rosas Del Paraiso Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro mujeres microempresarias una de ellas es Rosa mujer de 35 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 12 y 4 años, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 5 años. Su hija le ayuda a despachar, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabones, papel higiénico, pasta dental, chiverías, cigarros, galletas, leches, etc. Suhey mujer de 35 años su negocio es la venta de accesorios de plata, Gabriela joven de 20 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y accesorios de plata y Ana mujer 38 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
There are four businesswomen in this group. One of them is Rosa who is 35 years old, has a partner and two children aged 12 and 4. She has run a corner store located in her house for five years. Her daughter helps her serve in the store. The loan Rosa is seeking will be used to buy items such as basic grains, rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, toilet paper, toothpaste, yogurt-based snacks, cigarettes, cookies, milk etc. 

The other members of the group are Suhey aged 35 who sells silver accessories, Gabriela aged 20 who sells clothing and silver accessories, and Ana who is 38 and sells new clothing.

loans.use: Buy items for her grocery store such as basic grains, rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, toilet paper, toothpaste, yogurt-based snacks, cigarettes, cookies, milk

loans.name: Las Margaritas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es  Rosa mujer de 44 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 17 años, su negocio es la elaboración de mechas de lampazo  desde hace 3 años, tiene 3 trabajadoras que le ayudan en la elaboración del producto. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año y medio. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como hilos y telas. Jessica mujer de 21 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada y  Margarita mujer de 66 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tortillas y gaseosas.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members. One of them is Rosa, a 44 year old woman, married with a 17 year old son. 

She has a mop head making business which she started 3 years ago. She has three workers that help her with making the product. 

She has been a member of the group for a year and a half. 

She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as threads and fabrics. 

Jessica, a 21 year old woman sells used clothing. Margarita, a 66 year old woman, sells tortillas and sodas.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as threads and fabrics at wholesale.

loans.name: Ebenecer Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Justa mujer de 49 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada desde hace 10 años, sus productos los comercializa ambulante y en su comunidad. El crédito lo requiere para comprar pacas de ropa usada. Delia mujer de 33 años de edad su negocio es la venta de lácteos y Julia mujer de 46 años de edad y su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial partners, on of whom is Justa. She is a 49 year old, marries woman, and her business is selling used clothes for the past 10 years. She markets her products by traveling, and in her community. She needs the loan to buy bales of used clothing. 

Delia, a 33 year old women, sells dairy products for her business, and Julia, a 46 year old woman, has a grocery store located in her home.

loans.use: to buy bales of used clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Aya

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances, Aya did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur.

Currently, Aya prepares and sells food for a living. She normally sells her food in Akonoma (near Cape Coast). She has been doing this for about two years. 

Aya is married and has three children.  Because her husband is unemployed; Aya uses all her income to feed and provide for her entire family.

She will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of food ingredients, which will aid her in improving her overall  sales. 

Aya wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of food ingredients

loans.name: Delfín Manuel

texts.es: El cliente reside en Libertad.  Empezó con la fabricación de muebles para luego emprender en su bazar propio, en donde vende libros, artículos varios y de tienda.  Trabaja todo el día junto con su sobrino que le ayuda en esta actividad.  No es casada y por el momento no tiene hijos.  Desea a futuro que su negocio siga surgiendo y dotarlo de más mercadería.  Ahora requiere el préstamo para la compra de artículos como libros y ropa.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in Libertad. He started out making furniture, but later he opened his own bazaar where he sells books and various other types of merchandise. He works every day at his business with the help of his nephew. The borrower is not married and currently has no children. In the future, he wants his business to keep growing and to stock it with more merchandise.

For now, he is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise, such as books and clothing.

loans.use: to buy books, clothing, and various other merchandise to sell in his bazaar.

loans.name: Kelly Martha

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Empezó hace unos años atrás cuando trabajaba con una prima vendiendo ropa por catálogo.  Desde entonces le ha gustado esta actividad y la realiza con la finalidad de ayudar a su esposo en la economía familiar.  Trabaja con él por las mañanas especialmente, que es cuando realiza las cobranzas de sus pedidos.  Además, su esposo labora en un taxi el resto del día.  Tiene 2 niñas pequeñas y desea en un futuro incrementar su negocio de ropa con mucha más mercadería.  Necesita el dinero para la adquisición de blusas, pantalones y ropa interior,
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad. A few years ago, she began working with her cousin by selling clothes through catalogs. Since then, she has enjoyed this line of work and it has enabled her to help her husband with the family’s finances. The borrower works at her business mostly in the mornings, which is when she collects her orders. In addition, her husband works the rest of the day by driving a taxi. They have two young daughters. In the future, she would like to increase her clothing business by adding more merchandise.

The borrower needs money so that she can acquire blouses, trousers, and undergarments.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, and undergarments.

loans.name: Aminata's Group

texts.fr:
Ce  groupe  créé le 27 Juin  2008 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois. Il compte en son sein des femmes qui habitent toutes dans le même village. Elles partagent des valeurs de solidarité et entre aide qui caractérisent leurs actions et relations entre membre du groupe. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce accompagné de la culture sous pluie.

Madame Aminata  (debout l’extrême droite avec la main droite levée), est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants dont 01 fille. Elle est vendeuse d'huile de palme au village et fait comme activité secondaire l'agriculture sous pluie, de plus elle vend aussi le savon traditionnel et divers autres produits alimentaire à savoir les assaisonnements. Pour l'huile de palme, elle le bidon de 20 litres qu'elle revend au détail par bouteille d'un litre à 1 250 F CFA. pour le reste elle achète par lot ou en gros pour la revente au détail.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte achète un bidon et le reste en produit alimentaire pour la revente en préparation de la fête de Korité. 

Les bénéfices lui servent d’une part à épargner, d’autre part à aider son mari dans les charges familiales et scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on June 27, 2008 during the inauguration of their Banc Villageois. The group is made up of women who all live in the same village. They share the values ​​of solidarity and mutual aid that characterize their actions and relations between group members. Their main enterprises are small businesses, as well as rain-fed agriculture.

Saba Tening (seated on the far right with her hand raised), is the featured borrower for the group. She is married and the mother of five children, two of whom are girls. She maintains a table in the village where she sells local tobacco and various seasonings and sweets for children. She buys her merchandise from her suppliers at 5,000 Francs CFA for resale at retail by the kilo or sack for 25 Francs CFA.

With this loan she plans to purchase three lots of tobacco and seasonings for at least 45,000 Francs CFA, for resale during the festival of Korité. The rest of her loan will be used to purchase sweets and cookies for children. Part of the income she earns will put aside to save, and the remainder she will use to help her husband with their family responsibilities and the children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase three lots of tobacco and seasonings for at least 45,000 Francs CFA, for resale during the festival of Korité, and to purchase sweets and cookies for children.

loans.name: Reynaldo Leonidas

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Ha ejercido esta actividad desde hace mucho tiempo atrás y siempre le ha resultado muy productiva.  Trabaja solo por su cuenta durante todo el día.  Es casado y su esposa se ocupa de las labores del hogar.  Tiene 4 hijos, quienes estudian en la escuela fiscal de su barrio.  Ahora necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de repuestos y llantas para su vehículo.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad.  He has been in this business for a long time and has always achieved productive results.  He works alone throughout the whole day.  The borrower is married and his wife keeps herself busy with the household duties.  They have four children who attend a state school in their neighborhood.

For now, the borrower needs a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of spare parts and tires for his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Mirian De Jesus

texts.es:
Dona Mirian of Jesus with 45 years in his youth graduated from chartered accountant and currently is studying difficulties although remote a degree in college. Previously he had not done since his parents did not have the resources to help you complete college but taught him to work the land. She is married with 3 children the oldest is 17 years who shared cycle path and then decided to emigrate to the United States to seek a better life status, the second daughter is 15 and is in his third year common cycle and the third daughter is 13 and is in his first year common cycle in a basic center in the same community. She's a very feisty and also works as a teacher in the basic center of the community to help her husband to generate more income for your family. Customers are wineries that it has exclusively engaged in the purchase and sale of coffee in another location specifically.
She has asked the COMIXMUL cooperative financing with which you plan to maintain a good portion of land on which the expenditure is large and does not have the capital to purchase agricultural inputs.
One of the dreams for the future is to have a hardware store in the community because there is much needed and which as enterprising woman fighter and has identified the need to satisfy one of its goals. She believes that other business can offer a better status of life to their children and fulfill its purpose, which is to leave them a strengthened balance sheet.

loans.use: for the purchase of fertilizer, foliar pesticides among others for their coffee crops.

loans.name: Elvia Rosa

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Machala.  Comenzó con esta actividad tiempo atrás cuando su esposo la abandonó, entonces emprendió en la venta de gaseosas y el alquiler de baños.  Trabaja junto a su hijo de lunes a sábado.  Es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, de los cuales uno estudia en escuela fiscal.  Desea a futuro construír su propia casa y mantener esta actividad junto a sus hijos.  Necesita el crédito para a la compra de bebidas (colas, aguas, hidratantes, etc.) para su venta.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the city of Machala.  She started her business some time ago when her husband abandoned her.  At that point, she began selling sodas and managing pay toilets.  She and her son work together Monday through Saturday.  The borrower is a single mother with two children, one of whom attends a state school.  In the future, she would like to build a house of her own and maintain her business along with her children.  

The borrower needs a loan in order to buy beverages (colas, water, energy drinks, and other products) that she can sell.

loans.use: to buy colas, water, energy drinks, and other beverages.

loans.name: Mariana Isabel

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó cuando tuvo la oportunidad de adquirir un cibercafé que se encontraba en venta, con el dinero que había recibido por la liquidación de su trabajo anterior.  Ya tiene 2 años trabajando con su local y hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien.  Es casada y su esposo trabaja como guardia de seguridad en una compañía.  Tiene 3 hijos y todos estudian en la escuela fiscal del barrio.  Le gustaría poder tener una despensa junto con su negocio actual y también mantener a su familia junto con su madre.  Por ahora, requiere el préstamo para la compra de una computadora y bebidas (agua, colas e hidratantes) que expende en su local.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Machala. She started when she had the oppurtunity to acquire an internet cafe that was on sale, and used the money that she got when she left her previous job. She has been working for two years now at the business and so far it has been going very well for her. She is married and her husband works as a security guard at a company. She has 3 children, and all of them study at the public school in their district. She would like to have a small store along with her current business, as well as supporting her family along with her mother. For the moment, she needs a loan so that she can purchase a computer and beverages (water, soda, and hydrating liquids) that she sells at her business.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and beverages.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 61-year-old woman married to Maurice and blessed with five children, aged 30, 28, 26, 24 and 22 years, respectively. She sells grocery goods, a business she has been doing for the past four years, and earns a monthly income of 30,000 KES (Kenyan shillings). 

The business has grown after she took the first loan of 30,000 KES to boost her stock. She has now requested a second loan of 40,000 KES to purchase more fruits and vegetables. The profit she earns will aid her in building rental houses on her piece of land she purchased recently. Her dream is to invest in the real estate business.

loans.use: To purchase more fruits and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent used the previous loan to buy tea for planting. He is a 55-year-old hardworking man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and building a permanent home. 

For 16 years, he has been growing tea, and the business has been very profitable since he is near a tea factory and thus assured of a ready market. His hardships are seasonal weather, price fluctuations and inflation, while his vision is diversifying his business to include a retail shop, buying land to grow more tea and hiring employees to help expand his business. Vincent is requesting a loan to buy tea seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy tea seedlings for planting.

loans.name: William

texts.en: William used the previous loan to buy goats to sell. He is a 28-year-old, hardworking man who lives in Kasese, Uganda. Four years ago, he decided to trade in goats after assessing the lucrative nature of the business. This is due to the fact that goats are used as a dowry during customary marriages in the district, and other traders export them to the Democratic Republic of Congo. His major challenge is inadequate capital to supply the vast market, while his dreams are to own a ranch and also trade in cattle. William intends to use the loan to buy goats and cows to sell.

loans.use: to buy goats  and cows to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a hardworking woman with 6 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She works in farming and with the profits she has been able to educate her children. She has a vision of expanding her maize plantation to increase on her yields despite facing challenges of unpredictable weather changes and inadequate capital. Mary intends to use the loan to plant more maize.

loans.use: to plant more maize.

loans.name: Angel Rolando

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 25 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus familiares, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.
 
Ángel es vendedor en la farmacia cruz azul. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar una lavadora, refrigeradora. 

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá  comprar los electrodomesticos al contado y con descuento.  

Las  compras lo realizan  en  Ventanas cada semana.   

Su sueño es comprar una casa.  Su desafío son las plagas. 

En sus tiempos libres le gusta  descansar.
texts.en:
Ángel, 25, is single living with his relatives in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  Ángel works as a salesman in the Cruz Azul Pharmacy.  

He requests the loan to buy a washing machine and a refrigerator.  With the loan’s support he’ll be able to pay cash for the home appliances and get a discount.  He makes his purchases weekly in Ventanas.  

His dream is to buy a house and his challenge is pests.  He enjoys resting in his free time.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Christiana

texts.en:
Christiana is a small scale food vender who sells cooked rice and vegetable stew in Npatado (near Takoradi). She has had some form of formal education as she is a primary graduate. She is married and has two children. Her husband is a mason.

Christiana has been working as a food vender for close to ten years. Her income is used to help her husband pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. She plans on using her loan to purchase an increased quantity of rice and vegetables, thus allowing her to meet rising customer demands. She hopes to use the profits from her enterprise to fulfill her dream of buying a food stand, hence helping her sell from a fixed location in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of rice and vegetables, thus allowing her to meet rising customer demands

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel lives in the Muranga area of Kenya, which is situated near Nairobi. He has four children and has been doing this work for 20 years.  His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, and crops.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'He enjoys growing horticultural crops because of the reliable and high returns.' His biggest challenge is 'High input prices.'

Daniel was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'Because of the favorable loan terms.' This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'Microfinance gives loans to farmers in groups.'

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked 'How will this loan benefit your family?', Daniel replied 'He will be able to improve the family's living standards and to expand his farming projects.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Daniel owns the following: 'cow, poultry, pump, bicycle' but does not own 'pig, motorcycle, automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net, electricity, running water' but does not have 'solar power, sewing machine, TV, DVD'.

loans.use: To purchase dairy goats.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 53 years old and lives in the town of Kumi in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has five children with one of them currently in school. For the past 15 years, John has been working hard to manage his health clinic, which sells medicine. 

To help expand his business, John has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more medicine and some equipment for the clinic, and will help John to generate greater profits and build a house of his own and provide basic needs for the family. John hopes that in the future he will be able to see his business expand more. 

John is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like John who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more medicine and some equipment for the clinic

loans.name: Pedro Eduardo

texts.es:
Pedro tiene  42   años de edad, su estado civil es unión libre, tiene tres  hijos vive con su esposa e hijos en el Cantón Urdaneta  Provincia de Los Ríos.

La descripción de la ventanilla es VRC Palmasola, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Palmasola, pertenece  a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta, se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Guevara se dedica a la  agricultura, siembra de maíz y arroz. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, abonos. 

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá  comprar los fertilizantes a menor precio por ser el pago al contado.  

Las  compras lo realizan  en Ricaute cada semana.   

Su sueño es comprar un terreno. 

Su desafío son los cambios climáticos.  

En sus tiempos libres le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
Pedro is 42 years old, lives with his common-law wife and three children in Urdaneta Canton, Los Rios Province. He is a member of the Palmasola communal bank which is located in the Recinto Palmasola, part of Ricaurte Parish, Urdaneta Canton. The members are farmers or raise livestock. 

Pedro is a farmer who plants corn and rice. He needs this loan to buy fertilizer, manure and supplies. With the help of this loan he can pay cash and get a low purchase price. He buys his supplies in Ricaute weekly.  His dream is to buy some land. His challenge is the changes in climate. In his spare time he likes to play arena football (soccer).

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and supplies.

loans.name: Jiyoung

texts.en:
This loan will help Jenny prepare her baby clothing business for the busy fall and winter seasons.

Jenny’s interest in crafting children’s clothing began when she worked for a clothing line during college. After she graduated, she decided to pursue her new passion for clothing design and, in 2006, she launched her own company, Overall Baby. Wanting to create fun, fashionable and practical clothes for kids, Jenny decided to bring the idea of the overall back into style. She began by selling her brand on Etsy.com. However, wholesalers soon were contacting Jenny about her sporty all-cotton clothes and her brand took off.

Now her overalls are sold online and in stores nationwide, as well as in stores in Australia, Canada, Italy and Indonesia. Jenny’s busiest time of the year is fall, leading up to the holiday season. This loan will help Jenny purchase the materials and supplies she needs to meet the pending seasonal demand. 

View Jenny’s products and learn more about her business at: http://overallbaby.com/

loans.use: to purchase supplies and materials in preparation for the busy fall season.

loans.name: Jorge Elías

texts.es: El cliente es del sector de Orquídeas en Guayaquil.  Empezó con esta actividad debido a que tiene la idea de que a su edad se debería emprender en un negocio propio.  Trabaja solo desde muy temprano en la mañana la noche.  Es soltero pero tiene hijos que ya son mayores de edad.  Aspira poder mejorar su vivienda a futuro, así como adquirir otra moto para expandir su negocio.  Al momento necesita del dinero para invertirlo en la compra de repuestos para su tricimoto.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the sector of Orquídeas in Guayaquil.  He started this venture because he came up with the idea that he should establish his own business at his age.  He works alone from the early morning hours until nightfall.  The borrower is single and has grown children.  He aspires to improve his home in the future, as well as acquire another motorcycle for expanding his business.  

At the moment, he needs the money from this loan so that he can invest in spare parts for his three-wheeled motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Jazmín Fernanda

texts.es: El cliente corresponde al sector de Orquídeas en Guayaquil.  Empezó con esta actividad debido a que desea pasar más tiempo con sus hijos y estar pendiente de sus necesidades.  Labora todos los días en diferentes horarios.  Es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, quienes estudian en la escuela fiscal del área.  Le gustaría a futuro, poder incrementar su negocio, comprar un vehículo y poder viajar con su familia.  Por ahora, necesita el préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza y congeladores para su venta.
texts.en: This borrower works in the Orquídeas neighborhood of Guayaquil. She started her business because she wanted to spend more time with her children and to look after their needs. She works a different schedule everyday. She is a single mother with 2 young children who study at the public school in the area. In the future, she would like to grow her business, buy a vehicle, and be able to travel with her family. For now, she needs this loan to buy beauty products and freezers for her store.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and freezers

loans.name: Lucelinda Daisy

texts.es: La cliente reside en el sector de Orquídeas en la ciudad de Guayaquil.  Se dedicó a esta actividad debido a que pudo percatarse de que al tener otro ingreso mejoraría  su vida familiar.  Labora en su negocio de venta de comidas junto a una persona que le ayuda desde las 7 am hasta la noche.  Es casada y su esposo ejerce la función de guardia en una empresa.  Tiene un hijo menor de edad, quien estudia en el colegio fiscal del área donde habita.  A futuro planea construír un segundo piso para su casa, ver culminar los estudios de su hijo e incrementar su negocio.  Ahora requiere el dinero del préstamo para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the sector of Orquídeas in the city of Guayaquil.  She has been involved in this business because she thought it would be a good idea to have another income for improving her family’s life.  Her business involves selling food and she works with another person who helps her from 7:00 A.M. until nightfall.  

The borrower is married and her husband works for a company as a security guard.  They have a child who is attending a state high school in the area where they live.  In the future, she plans to build a second floor to her house, see her son finish his studies, and expand her business.  For now, she needs the money from this loan for home improvements.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Dina Eudocia

texts.es: La cliente vive en la ciudad de Durán.  Empezó su negocio cuando invirtió sus ahorros de toda la vida en montar su tienda propia.  De esta forma, ha ido creciendo poco a poco hasta el día de hoy.  Trabaja todo el día desde el interior de su casa.  Es madre soltera y sus hijos ya son mayores de edad.  Ellos le ayudan en todo lo que necesita con frecuencia.  Ahora desea invertir el crédito en la compra de carne, botellones de agua y abarrotes para la venta en su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the city of Durán.  She started her business when she invested all of her savings into establishing this venture.  By taking this approach, she was able to grow a little bit at a time to the point where she is at today.  The borrower works every day at her business, which is located inside of her house.  She is a single mother and her children are already grown.  They help out quite frequently with everything that needs to be done.  

For now, the borrower wants to invest her loan in the purchase of meat, bottle water, and groceries that she can sell in her business.

loans.use: to buy meat, bottle water, and groceries to sell.

loans.name: William Gilberto

texts.es: El cliente vive en el sector de Guasmo en Guayaquil.  Aprendió esta actividad de su padre y luego de esto, emprendieron en un negocio familiar.  Trabaja con sus hermanos y ayudantes todos los días en su taller.  Es casado y su esposa se dedica a las labores del hogar.  Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, ninguno de ellos estudia aún.  Desea en un futuro, poder seguir trabajando de la mejor forma, con la finalidad de incrementar su clientela y también mejorar su estilo y condiciones de vida de toda su familia.  Ahora quiere invertir el crédito en materiales para su taller, como pinturas, soldadura, macilla y lijas.
texts.en: This client lives in the Guasmo area of Guayaquil.  He learnt this trade from his father and subsequently they set up a family business.  He works with his brothers and assistants every day in his workshop.  He is married and his wife is a housewife.  He has 2 children, both minors and neither of them are studying yet.  In the future, he hopes to be able to continue working in the best way, so he can increase his customer base and also improve his entire family's lifestyle and living conditions.  He wants to invest the loan in material for his workshop, such as paint, welding supplies, filler and abrasives .

loans.use: to buy material for his workshop (abrasives, welding supples, paint and filler)

loans.name: Murtiasa

texts.en:
Murtiasa just began working with Ruma on July 23, 2013 to run Ruma’s new business cashing in and cashing out customer’s money for Ruma’s bank partner. As a new agent with Ruma, Murtiasa needs and hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to start his new business. Murtiasa wishes this new business to be another source of income for his family.

Murtiasa lives in Angkas, Selemadeg Barat, Bali, a rural area about four hours from Denpasar. Murtiasa is married, has one child, and lives with three people in the family house.

Prior to joining Ruma, Murtiasa worked as a contract employee.

loans.use: to have start-up capital to process branchless banking transactions

loans.name: Suparman

texts.en:
Suparman just began working with Ruma on July 23, 2013 to run Ruma’s new business cashing in and cashing out customer’s money for Ruma’s bank partner. As a new agent with Ruma, Suparman needs and hopes to get a Kiva loan for working capital to start his new business. Suparman wishes this new business to be another source of income for his family.

Suparman lives in Gadungan, Selemandeg Timur, Bali, a rural area about four hours from Denpasar. Suparman is married, has two children, and lives with four people in the family house.

Prior to joining Ruma, Suparman worked on the BT Cocoa staff and was a farmer.

loans.use: to have additional capital to process branchless banking transactions

loans.name: Aswar

texts.en:
Aswar just began working with Ruma on July 23, 2013 to run Ruma’s new business cashing in and cashing out customer’s money for Ruma’s bank partner. As a new agent with Ruma, Aswar needs and hopes to get a Kiva loan for working capital to start his new business. Aswar wishes this new business will be another source of income for his family.

Aswar lives in Gilimanuk, Bali, a rural area about five hours from Denpasar. Aswar is single. Prior to joining Ruma, Aswar worked on the BT Cocoa staff

loans.use: to have working capital to process branchless banking transactions .

loans.name: Steve

texts.en: Steve is a 31 years old young Tanzanian living with his wife and two children. He is determined to live a model life within his community. As part of his dedication to avoid cutting trees for firewood (cooking energy), Steve is determined to install a biodigester. He believes that by doing this his community will be influenced to imitate him and finally they can save trees which are quickly disappearance due to deforestation. Moreover, Steve will be able to save his family earnings that would have gone to buying kerosene and fertilizer (biodigester produces a very nice fertilizer). He has requested TAHUDE Foundation to provide him with a loan of USD 625 to purchase/install the biodigester.

loans.use: to purchase/install a 6 cubic meter biodigester.

loans.name: Shadrack

texts.en:
Shadrack lives in the Litein area of Kenya. His primary income sources are milk and eggs. He has three children, and has been doing this work for seven years.  

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'rearing a dairy cow.' His biggest challenge is 'animal diseases.'  Animals on the farm have not been given names.

Shadrack was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'It helps us to buy a cow.'  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'Have an economical importance to our lives.'

His highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked 'How will this loan benefit his family', Shadrack replied 'Increase and expand sources of income to improve living standards.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Shadrack owns the following: 'cow, poultry' but does not own 'pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net, solar power, running water' but does not have 'electricity, sewing machine, TV, DVD'.

loans.use: To construct a green house.

loans.name: Peris

texts.en:
Peris lives in the Litein area of Kenya, a very fertile area. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, and crops. She has three children, and has been doing this work for eight years. 

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'egg collection.' Her biggest challenge is: 'raising money.' Animals on the farm have not been given names.

Peris was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: 'quick loan processing.'  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'loans given to farmers.'

Her highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked 'How will this loan benefit her family', Peris replied 'will educate her children.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Peris owns the following: 'cow, poultry, bicycle' but does not own 'pig, pump, motorcycle, automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net, electricity, TV, DVD', but does not have 'solar power, running water, sewing machine'.

loans.use: To purchase poultry.

loans.name: Lado's Group

texts.en:
Lado is a very talented lady and has skills of making artificial jewelry, particularly nose pins. These jewelry items are very popular in marriages due to the fact that gold has become very costly and not everyone can afford it. 

Her husband is a vegetable seller while 3 of her 4 children work to financially contribute to the family. 

Lado has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for further improvement of her artificial jewelry-making business. 

With the loan investment, she will buy beads and other materials for making artificial jewelry in larger quantities which will help her fulfill client orders on time and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy beads and other materials for her artificial jewelry-making business.

loans.name: Diana Mireya

texts.es:
DIANA CAÑON nació en una de las ciudades grandes del país de Colombia BOGOTA. En su inicio de vida fue criada en un hogar llamado jardín donde su mamá trabajaba en una empresa de flores y el horario era muy extenso el cual no le daba tiempo de compartir con sus hijos, pues ella era la menor de dos hombres varones.  Un día conoció a un muchacho quien pensó que sería el hombre de su vida con el tuvo un pequeño niño, fue la gran decepción para la familia pues era la única mujer  y aun no había terminado el bachillerato. Su mamá decidió apoyarla para que terminara el bachillerato y termino con gran orgullo pues el padre del niño nunca lo reconoció. Decidió empezar a trabajar en una empresa de flores donde adquiriría un poco más de experiencia laboral allí fue contratada por una temporal, al año y medio le realizaron exámenes para ingresar por empresa pues después de un mes de este proceso conoció a otro muchacho del cual lo quiso muchísimo y volvió a quedar embarazada. Nació otro pequeño niño, este hombre si lo reconoció y le colabora con la alimentación de ellos, pero aun así no vive con ellos pues era un hombre con bastantes mujeres. Ella muy desilusionada de esta situación decidió levantar cabeza y salir adelante y estudiar una carrera técnica. La que le llamo la atención fue ADMINISTRACION EN SALUD puesto que cada vez que ella iba a sus controles ella admiraba al personal administrativo que la atendía siempre fueron muy amables y cariñosas con ella y así fue como le empezó a gustar esta carrera. El propósito de ella es estudiar y entrar a una clínica u hospital, para así con el mayor compromiso sacar su casa y brindarles a sus dos pequeños hijos un hogar digno y acogedor donde no tengan que aguantar regaños ni humillaciones de otras personas de igual manera apoyara a sus dos hijos en el estudio para que sean hijos ejemplares en la vida.                                
Por este motivo ella estudia emotivamente con ganas y fuerzas para ser un buen ejemplo de madre e hija.
texts.en:
Diana was born in Bogotá, one of the big cities of Colombia. At the start of her life she was brought up in a home known as a garden where her mother worked for a flower company. Her hours of work were very long so she did not have time to spend with her children, Diana and her 2 older brothers. One day Diana met a man who she thought would be the man in her life and she had a little boy with him. It was a big disappointment for the family because she was the only girl and she still had not finished her high school education. Her mother decided to help her finish her certificate of secondary education and she was very proud to finish her studies, since the father of her child never accepted him. 

Diana decided to work in a flower company where she would get a bit more work experience and was taken on there as a temporary worker. After a year and a half she took exams to join the company. A month after this she met another boy who she liked very much and she became pregnant again. She had another little boy and this time the father accepted him and helps her to buy food for the children. He does not live with them, however, since he is a man with a lot of girlfriends. 

Feeling very disappointed by this situation, Diana decided to pick herself up and improve her situation in life by studying for a technical degree. What attracted her was Health Administration since every time she went for her check-ups she admired the administrative staff who dealt with her. They were always kind and affectionate with her and so this career began to appeal to her. 

Diana's aim is to study and start work at a clinic or hospital so that, with great commitment, she can keep her household going and give her 2 little boys a decent and welcoming home where they will not have to put up with being scolded or humiliated by other people. She will also support her 2 sons in their studies so that they become model sons. For this reason Diana studies with great enthusiasm and determination to be an exemplary mother and daughter.

loans.use: to pay for studies in health administration at Campoalto.

loans.name: Adriana Marcela

texts.es:
El deseo de Adriana es estudiar en campo alto  porque  quiere superarse más, ya que debido a que no ha estudiado se le han cerrado muchas puertas a nivel laboral. Para ella es muy importante estudiar a esta edad  porque quiere demostrarles  a sus hijos y amigos que nunca es tarde para aprender y que el estudio es la base para una vida mejor.
Adriana tiene muchas expectativas  al estudiar para Auxiliar judicial porque le gusta mucho el tema y le apasiona, y aunque no es una carrera profesional, se ha dado cuenta que los técnicos también son valorados a nivel empresarial. Solo espera poder aprender al máximo y poder ejercer laboralmente en esta área.
Básicamente no ha podido estudiar por cuestiones económicas y esta oportunidad que le están ofreciendo de acceder a un descuento adicional por parte del convenio Kiva le ha hecho tomar la decisión de no dejar pasar las oportunidades que la vida me da en este momento.
texts.en:
Adriana's wish is to study at CampoAlto because she wants to exceed. Since she has not studied, many doors in the labour field have been closed to her. It is very important for her to study at this age because she wants to show her children and friends that it is never late to learn and that studying is the base for a life better.

Adriana has high expectations studying for Judicial Assistant because she likes the subject very much and she is passionate about it. And although it is not a professional course she has realized that the technicians also are valued at a business level. She hopes to learn the most and to be able to work in this area.

Basically, she hasn't been able to study because of financial reasons and this opportunity that is being offered to her, to gain admission at an additional discount on behalf of the Kiva agreement, has made her make the decision of not passing on the opportunity that life is giving me now.

loans.use: to study at CampoAlto.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es: Maryluz tiene 33 año,  es una  mujer casada  con dos hermosas hijas, es una persona emprendedora, honesta, responsable, sencilla, vive en Bosa el Recreo  tiene un sueño por cumplir desde hace muchos años, un proyecto de vida a largo plazo que no ha podido realizar por muchas circunstancias pero llego el momento de hacer realidad,   ya que sus hijas están un poco grandecitas y pude empezar a trabajar en una empresa de plásticos , ella quiere estudiar AUXILIAR EN  ENFERMERIA  ya que  de esta manera puede ayudar a personas que tanto lo necesitan, atenderlas en momentos tan difíciles y así hacerles mas llevaderas las dolencias  que puedan tener en el momento.  Hacer practicas en otras áreas como cuidados intensivos, urgencias, sobre todo en partos es una de las áreas mas bonitas ya que ella al ser madre sabe lo hermoso que es ver nacer  un una criatura inocente.Al estudiar AUXILIAR EN  ENFERMERIA ella tendrá  un trabajo mas estable  donde pueda ganar un poco mas de dinero y asi poder brindarle  a su familia un futuro mejor,  con un ejemplo de madre a seguir teniendo una carrera por delante  para que ellas el día de mañana tengan una base solida  de una carrera a seguir y unos sueños a corto plazo por cumplir ya que maryluz  los puede alcanzar  gracias a la oportunidad que el convenio Kiva  le puede brindar financiándole su carrera  para alcanzar el sueño que tanto ha querido realizar.
texts.en:
Maryluz, 33, is a married woman with two beautiful daughters. She is an enterprising, honest, responsible, and simple person who lives in Bosa el Recreo. For many years, she has had a dream to fulfill, a long-term life plan that she has not been able to take on for many reasons. However, the time has come to make her dream come true, now that her daughters are a little older and she has been able to start working at a plastics company. 

She wants to study to become a nursing assistant, because she will be able to give help to people who really need it, serve them in difficult times, and make their pain more bearable. She would like to do internships in various areas, such as intensive care, the emergency room, and above all the delivery room. She considers this to be one of the most beautiful areas, because as a mother, she knows how beautiful it is to see the birth of an innocent baby.

By studying to become a nursing assistant, she will have a more stable job which will allow her to earn a little more money, thus giving her family a better future. She will be a good example to her daughters by having a career ahead of her, so that her daughters have a solid foundation of a career to follow and short-term dreams to fulfill in the future. Maryluz will be able to achieve her own dreams, thanks to this opportunity which Kiva can give her by financing her degree to make true the dream she has wanted so badly.

loans.use: to study at Campoalto.

loans.name: Rehana's Group

texts.en:
Rehana has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband's business of making and selling matches. These matches are used to burn fire for cooking and other purposes. 

With the loan investment he will buy wooden sticks and fire catching material for making matches and sell in the market. 

He is very experienced and has been operating his business for the past many years and Rehana has full confidence in him that he will be able to earn more profits by putting money into his business. 

She is a mother of 6 children. All of them are enrolled in local school and getting their education. Rehana knows the importance of education and wants her children to complete the education and she is very much sure that with the improvement of her husband's business she will be able to save money for her children's future education expenses.

loans.use: To buy sticks, fire burning material for making matches and selling

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen is a sewing expert. Her family appreciates her for supporting them and working so hard to make their financial life easier. 

Her husband is a fruit seller and sells seasonal fruits in the market. 

Perveen is a mother of a son and a daughter. Both of them are young and stay at home. 

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for further improvement of her sewing business. 
With the loan investment she will buy a new sewing machine and clothes for improve her work quality and income. 

She is very experienced and has a good number of clients in her community who give her regular orders. She is confident about her business's further growth as a result of loan investment.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Iram's Group

texts.en:
Iram is a doll maker. She gets orders from different gift shops in the market and supplies dolls to them in order to make money for her family. 

Her husband is a driver while her 3 sons stay at home as she couldn't provide them education due to financial constraints. 

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for buying clothes, thread and other related material for making more dolls and sells in the market. 

She is confident that by investing the loan she will be able to earn enough money to send her younger children to school.

loans.use: To buy cloth, thread etc for doll making business

loans.name: Ndack's Group

texts.fr: le groupe a été crée le 14/05/2010 et est composé de femmes issues de différents quartier. Le groupe a été composé par affinité entre ses membres et sur la base de confiance elles sont venues adhérer dans BV. Leurs activités sont le commerce, la coiffure, la couture et l élevage. Khady  l'emprunteur en vedette est veuve âgée de 49 ans et mère de 6 enfants debout à droite de la photo avec le foulard, elle fait le petit commerce de poissons et de divers choses habits et chaussures en plus de cela elle fait de l'élevage ovine chez elle. Avec les bénéfices elle gère la scolarité des enfants, et elle fait de l'investissement progressif immobilier ( construction)car son mari est décédé
texts.en: This group was created on 14/05/2010 and consists of women from different neighborhoods. The group was formed by ties between its members and on the basis of trust they joined "banc villageois." Their businesses are retail, hairdressing, sewing, and breeding. Khady, the featured borrower, is a 49 year old widow and mother to 6 children. She is standing to the right in the photo wearing a scarf. She is a small retailer of fish and a variety of things, clothing and shoes. In addition to this she breeds sheep at home. With the profits she manages the schooling of her children and she invests progressively in property (construction) since her husband is deceased.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: fish, clothing, shoes and sheep.

loans.name: Fatmata's Group

texts.en:
These are members of a primary school in Bo city. They want a loan of 9,600,000 SLL to help them meet their immediate needs. Some of them want the loan in order to invest in business, some to pay their children's school fees and other school related charges, and others would like to invest the loan in a house-building project.

Fatmata is the featured leader of this group. A native of Songo, in northern Sierra Leone, Fatmata is married to a paramount chief/lecturer and the couple has five children, who are attending school/college. Fatmata has been a school teacher for 34 years now. She has requested this loan in order to buy house-building material like iron corrugated sheets, cement, etc. for the construction of a dwelling.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials like iron corrugated sheets and cement for the construction of a house

loans.name: Sunilda Regina

texts.es: La cliente vive en el sector de Suburbio en Guayaquil.  Comenzó vendiendo ropa interior, sábanas y edredones; para luego emprender en la venta de productos de belleza de la línea Esika.  Posteriormente, un grupo de amigas también la involucran en la venta de artículos de la línea Yanbal.  Esta actividad le ha resultado muy productiva, sobre todo considerando el momento en el que inició, debido a la separación de su esposo y la necesidad de tener un ingreso económico para su familia.  Labora en la tienda durante la mañana y en la tarde se dedica a repartir sus pedidos de cosméticos.  El negocio de la tienda es atendido por su hija mientras ella sale en la tarde.  Tiene 2 hijos, quienes ya son mayores de edad y tienen compromiso.  Quisiera a futuro, incrementar su negocio de tienda para no tener que salir mucho.  Ahora necesita invertir el dinero del préstamo en abarrotes para la tienda y productos de belleza para su venta.
texts.en:
This client lives in Guayaquil’s Suburbio sector. She started out selling underwear, sheets and comforters and then went into selling Esika brand beauty products.  Later on a group of friends also got her involved in selling Yanbal brand products.  This activity has turned out to be very productive above all considering the moment she started it when she separated from her husband and had to earn economic support for her family.

She works in the store during the morning and spends the evening delivering her customers’ cosmetics orders.  Her daughter watches the store when she goes out in the evening.  She has two children who are adults now and involved in relationships.  She’d like in future to increase the store business in order not to have to go out so much.  She now needs to invest the loan’s money in grocery items for the store and in beauty products to sell.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies and stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Aidee Maricela

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Inició en esta actividad cuando una amiga la invitó e incentivó a que se uniera a un grupo de vendedoras de productos por catálogo.  Ya lleva varios años realizándola y hasta ahora le ha resultado muy fructífera.  Trabaja sola y en las tardes también se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas en su casa.  No es casada pero tiene 2 hijas, de las cuales la 1 es casada y la otra tiene 13 años y asiste a la escuela fiscal del sector donde vive.  Desea a futuro que sus hijas terminen sus estudios y montar un pequeño restaurante ya que le gusta mucho la cocina.  Por ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de ropa, zapatillas y perfumes para su comercialización.
texts.en: This client is from Portoviejo.  She started this activity when a friend invited her and encouraged her to join a group of catalog products saleswomen.  She’s been doing this for several  years now and it’s turned out to be quite fruitful.  She works alone and in the evenings also sells fast-food at home.  She’s not married but has two daughters.  One of them is married and the other is 13-years-old and attends the local public school.  In future she’d like her daughters to complete their schooling and she’d like to open a small restaurant because she likes to cook very much.  For now, she needs the loan to buy clothes, slippers and perfume to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes, slippers and perfume.

loans.name: Angela Del Rocío

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Inició en esta actividad hace 3 años, cuando realizó cursos moda y costura.  Tenía desde pequeña la ilusión de ser modista y su madre le ayudó a conocer todo acerca del tema.  Realiza su trabajo sola en su domicilio, puesto que no tiene horario fijo.  No es casada y vive en la casa de sus padres con su hijo de 3 años, quien asiste al jardín de infantes.  Quisiera a futuro poder llegar a tener su propia factoría para poder tener ventas al por mayor y además gozar de buena salud.  Por ahora requiere del préstamo para la compra de telas y una máquina para su labor.
texts.en: The client’s from the city of Portoviejo.  She started this activity three years ago after taking dressmaking courses.  She had the small dream of becoming a clothes designer and her mother helped her to learn everything on this topic.  She works alone at home and has no fixed schedule.  She’s not married and lives wither three-year-old son in her parents’ house; he attends Kindergarten.  In future, she’d like to have her own factory to be able to sell at wholesale and also to enjoy good health.  For now, she needs the loan to buy fabric and a sewing machine for her work.

loans.use: to buy fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Emelda

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Emelda works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from buying and selling fruits and vegetables and a general store. Emelda is borrowing PHP 12,000 through Kiva partner NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Emelda has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 40 years old and is married with one child. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Zenaida has been raising pigs for five years and also earns additional income from a general store.

Zenaida is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Agnes' Group

texts.en:
Agnes' group is comprised of two hard-working women. Agnes is 18 years old and lives in the town of Kyenjojo in the Mubende region of Uganda. For the past two years, Agnes has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells sugar, salt and soap. 

To help expand her business, Agnes  has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase beans and millet flour for the shop, and will help Agnes to generate greater profits and to expand the business. Agnes hopes that in the future she will be able to help her family. 
 
Agnes is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase beans and millet flour for her shop

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is an embroidery expert. She has got great skills and her embroidered clothes are very much appreciated by her clients. 

She is a mother of 6 children and all of them are continuing their education. Razia's 3 elder daughters are also learning the art of embroidery and help her in her work. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for further improvement of her embroidery business. 

At the moment, it is wedding season and she has a good number of orders to fulfill. She is confident that her business will be improved as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy embroidery material for her embroidery business

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Desde hace 7 años empezó a laborar en el comercio, después de que sufriera el abandono de su esposo.  Luego de ésto, decidió dedicarse por completo a esta actividad, con la finalidad de levantar su hogar y aportarle económicamente.  Trabaja junto con sus hijos, realizando sus recorridos por varios sectores de la ciudad, vendiendo sus productos.  Tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales el mayor labora en una vulcanizadora y los otros estudian en el colegio la especialidad de contabilidad.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería (productos naturales, sobrecamas y productos naturales) para su comercialización.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  She started working in commerce seven years ago when her husband abandoned her.  After this she decided to go into this activity full-time aiming at supporting her home and to contribute to it economically.  She works alongside her children going to various parts of the city selling her products.  She has three children.  The oldest works in a tire repair shop and the other attend secondary school specializing in accounting.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise (natural products, bedspreads and natural products) to sell.

loans.use: to buy shoes, natural products and bedspreads.

loans.name: Esmeralda Bibiana

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Escogió el negocio de venta de artículos por catálogo, debido a que es una actividad que le da mucha más comodidad y tiempo, pero sobretodo es muy rentable para ella.  Trabaja sola todos los días, sin un horario fijo.  Es divorciada y todos sus hijos son mayores de edad y están casados.  Tiene la aspiración de poder comprar un terreno, con la finalidad de construir una casa para que sus hijos tengan donde vivir en caso de que se divorcien o se queden solos; además desea tener un local donde pueda montar un comedor popular.  Por ahora necesita el crédito para comprar perfumes, maquillaje y bisutería.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  She chose the business of selling items by catalog because it’s an activity that gives her more comfort and time but above all is profitable for her.  She works alone every day with no set schedule.  She’s divorced and all her children are married adults.  She hopes to buy a piece of and to build a house so her children can have a place to live in case they divorce or are left alone.  She also would like to have a locale in which to open a low-cost eatery.  For now, she needs the loan to buy perfume, make-up and costume jewelry.

loans.use: to buy perfume, make-up and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a married woman with three children ranging from three years old to ten years old. She describes herself as honest. For the past three years, Grace has operated a retail store where she sells fish. Her business is located in a densely populated area where her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge as lacking funds for expansion. She will use the loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a water tank that will benefit nine of her family members. 

The water tank will enable them to store clean water for household use. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will make more profits from the business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank to store clean water for her household.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: El cliente vive en la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Tiene 12 años en la venta de limones y escogió esta actividad debido a que se compró un vehículo para transporte y con el cual también realiza fletes.  Trabaja todos los días, desde muy temprano en la mañana.  Se encuentra en estado de unión libre y su esposa es ama de casa.  Tiene 2 hijos, una hija de 10 años quien va a la escuela fiscal del sector y el otro de 11 meses de edad.  Su sueño a futuro es poder ver crecer a sus hijos y que tengan una profesión.  Por ahora necesita el préstamo para la compra de limones para su comercialización.
texts.en: This client lives in the city of Portoviejo.   He’s been selling lemons for 12 years and chose this activity because he bought a vehicle for transport that he also uses to make deliveries.  He works every day starting very early in the morning.  He’s in a common law relationship and his wife’s a housewife.  He has two children, a 10-year-old daughter attending public school and an 11-month-old son.  His future dream is to watch his children grow and that they have professions.  For now, he needs the loan to buy lemons to sell.

loans.use: to buy lemons.

loans.name: Mayita Tatiana

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Tiene 11 años laborando en este negocio, debido a que desde siempre le ha gustado la costura.  Trabaja todos los días y cuando tiene mucho por hacer, su hija le ayuda con sus labores.  Al momento está separada del papá de sus hijas.  Tiene 4 hijas, la mayor es casada y las demás tienen 17, 15 y 14 años.  La segunda hija va a la universidad y las otras 2 asisten a la escuela fiscal de su sector.  A futuro le gustaría que su taller de costura sea más grande, expandirse más y ser reconocida; asimismo, desea que sus hijas puedan desarrollarse profesionalmente.  Ahora necesita invertir el dinero del crédito en la compra de telas, hilos y demás artículos de costura.
texts.en: This client lives in the city of Portoviejo.  She’s been working in this business for 11 years because she’s always liked to sew.  She works every day and when she has much work to do her daughter helps her with the work.  At the moment she’s separated from her daughters’ father.  She has four daughters.  The oldest is married and the others are 17, 15 and 14 years old.  The second one attends university and the other two the local public school.  In future she’d like to have a larger sewing workshop, to expand more and to become well-known.  Also, she wants her daughters to develop professionally.  She needs to use the loan money  to buy fabric, thread and other sewing supplies.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Empezó en esta actividad tiempo atrás cuando decidió vender su volqueta y con la ayuda de su padre, decidió comprar un taxi dado que es era un negocio más rentable.  Labora todos los días desde muy temprano en la mañana.  No es casado ni tiene hijos.  Desea a futuro tener una casa propia y de ser posible comprar otro vehículo para hacerlo funcionar como taxi también.  Por ahora requier invertir el crédito en los arreglos para el funcionamiento de su vehículo.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  He started this activity some time ago when he decided to sell his dump truck and with his father’s help decided to buy a taxi which is a more profitable business.  He works every day starting very early in the morning.  He’s not married and has no children.  He wants in future to own a house and if possible to buy another vehicle and have it work as a taxi too.  For now, he needs the loan to repair his taxi.

loans.use: to repair the taxi.

loans.name: Jimmy Geovanny

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Empezó en esta actividad desde que tenía 15 años, cuando salía a trabajar con su padre quien también era maestro constructor.  Luego decidió independizarse y laborar por su propia cuenta, como lo ha hecho hasta ahora.    Labora solo y cuando tiene bastante trabajo, lo hace todos los días.  Actualmente se encuentra en estado de unión libre y su esposa es ama de casa.  Tiene un hijo de 8 años, quien estudia en la escuela fiscal del sector donde habita.  A futuro planea arreglar bien su casa, ya que no la ha terminado de construir; y además, tener un local para la venta de materiales de construcción.  Por ahora necesita el préstamo para la compra de herramientas de construcción para su labor.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  He started this activity when he was 15-years-old.  He used to go out to work with his father who was also a master builder.  He then decided to become independent and work for himself as he’s done to date.  He works alone and when there is much work to be done he works every day.  He’s currently in a common law relationship and his wife’s a housewife.  He has an 8-year-old son who attends the local public school.   In future he plans to fix his house up nicely since he’s not finished building it and also to have a locale to sell building supplies.  For now, he needs the loan to buy work tools for his construction work.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Darío Emiliano

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Portoviejo.  Desde muy joven le toco trabajar duro, le ayudaba a sus vecinos desde ahí aprendió la actividad y le ha resultado productiva hasta ahora.  Trabaja solo en las obras que le facilitan.  Está en estado de unión libre y tiene una niña de 3 años que no estudia.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de cerámicas.
texts.en: This client is from the city of Portoviejo.  He’s had to work hard from a very young age.  He used to help his neighbors and learned the activity there which has been productive to date.  He works alone on jobs he gets.  He’s in a common law relationship and has a three-year-old daughter who does not attend school yet.  He needs the loan to buy ceramic tile.

loans.use: to buy ceramic tile.

loans.name: Mayra Fernanda

texts.es: La cliente reside en Portoviejo.  Se dedicó a esta actividad debido a que su esposo era quien se dedicaba a la elaboración de los panes y ella aprendió ayudándolo todos los días.  Lamentablemente, luego se separaron y ella cogió a cargo el negocio, en donde labora hasta ahora.  Trabaja con sus hijos y su ex-suegra, de lunes a domingo.  Está soltera y tiene 4 hijos de 16, 12, 10 y 3 años quienes estudian en la escuela y colegio fiscal.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de harina y manteca para la producción del pan.
texts.en: This client lives in Portoviejo.  She’s worked in this activity because her husband was a baker and she learned by helping him every day.  Sadly, they separated and she took over the business where she’s worked to date.  She works with her children and her ex-mother-in-law from Monday to Sunday.  She’s single and has four children who are 16, 12, 10 and 3 years of age who attend public primary and secondary school.  She needs the loan now to buy flour and shortening to bake bread.

loans.use: to buy baking supplies.

loans.name: Angel Perfecto

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Quevedo.  Inició el negocio de la tienda hace tiempo atrás, junto con su esposa.  De igual manera, trabajan juntos en la tienda todos los días.  Tiene 2 hijos quienes estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector.  A futuro desea dejar un negocio establecido y reconocido para el bienestar de sus hijos.  Por ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de víveres para su tienda.
texts.en: This client lives in the city of Quevedo.  He started the store business some time go with his wife.  They work together in their store every day.  He has two children attending the local public school.  In future he’d like to leave a well-established, well-known store for his children’s well-being.  For now, he needs the loan to buy food items for his store.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Darwin Wilfrido
